channel.title: stack on Tracey Hoang
channel.description: Recent content in stack on Tracey Hoang

item.title: Design a Special Stack that supports finding max/min value in constant time
item.description: Source code Description Our task is to design a stack that supports some operations such as push a key in, pop an element out, and return maximum and minimum values. We also need to make sure all those operations are done in constant of time. The program lets user type in queries, and only terminates when user stops the program or when user type in “stop” query. Algorithm The idea is to use 3 different stacks, one to store the actual elements, the other two are auxiliary stacks to store maximum and minimum elements at current state.

item.title: Check for balanced brackets in a text - Stack
item.description: Source code Given a text that contains any brackets from the set [], {}, (). Our program is to check whether the text uses brackets correctly. If there are no mistake, print out “Balanced”. Otherwise, find index of the first unmatched closing brackets, or the last opening bracket without corresponding closing one, and print out “Unbalanced at index index”. For example: [()] –> Balanced [(] –> Unbalanced at index 3
